title: SOLD - 1887 Old Judge - Ned Hanlon HOF Rookie Card (SGC 10)
author: Archive

posts.post_title: SOLD - 1887 Old Judge - Ned Hanlon HOF Rookie Card (SGC 10)
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Phil Garry
Good Evening, Collectors:

Up for sale tonight is an 1887 Detroit Hall of Famer's Rookie Card:

1887 Old Judge (N172) - Ned Hanlon (SGC 10)

Please review scans of the front and back of the card for condition details. Sale price on this rare card is $375.00 dlvd. The first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: vguerrerobb@yahoo.com.


[IMG]http://i150.photobucket.com/albums/s120/bcbgcbrcb/NHanlon.jpg[/IMG]


[IMG]http://i150.photobucket.com/albums/s120/bcbgcbrcb/NHanlonB.jpg[/IMG]
